apps.name: ESign No Logs
apps.subtitle: ESign No Logs - ESign With No Logs
apps.description: Easily sideload with no computer, no revokes, unlimited app days and, no telemetry.
apps.localizedDescription: Easily sideload with no computer, no revokes, unlimited app days and, no telemetry.
apps.title: ESign No Logs

apps.name: Deltarune
apps.subtitle: Deltarune - IOS Port
apps.description: Fight (or spare) alongside new characters in UNDERTALE's parallel story, DELTARUNE...! Chapter 2 has not been added.
apps.localizedDescription: Fight (or spare) alongside new characters in UNDERTALE's parallel story, DELTARUNE...! Chapter 2 has not been added.
apps.title: Deltarune

apps.name: Undertale
apps.subtitle: Undertale - IOS Port
apps.description:
Welcome to UNDERTALE. In this RPG, you control a human who falls underground into the world of monsters.
Now you must find your way out... or stay trapped forever.
((Healthy Dog's Warning: Game contains imagery that may be harmful to players with photosensitive epilepsy or similar condition.))
apps.localizedDescription:
Welcome to UNDERTALE. In this RPG, you control a human who falls underground into the world of monsters.
Now you must find your way out... or stay trapped forever.
((Healthy Dog's Warning: Game contains imagery that may be harmful to players with photosensitive epilepsy or similar condition.))
apps.title: Undertale

apps.name: FNAF World
apps.subtitle: FNAF World - IOS Port
apps.description:
Featuring the entire cast from the Five Nights at Freddy's series, this fantasy RPG will let players control their favorite animatronics in a an epic animated adventure!
This port might be inaccurate.
apps.localizedDescription:
Featuring the entire cast from the Five Nights at Freddy's series, this fantasy RPG will let players control their favorite animatronics in a an epic animated adventure!
This port might be inaccurate
apps.title: FNAF World

apps.name: PPSSPP
apps.subtitle: PPSSPP - A PSP Emulator
apps.description: The best PSP Emulator for IOS Written in C++
apps.localizedDescription: The best PSP Emulator for IOS Written in C++
apps.title: PPSSPP

apps.name: Sonic Mania
apps.subtitle: Sonic Mania - IOS Port
apps.description: Sonic Mania is an all-new adventure with Sonic, Tails, and Knuckles full of unique bosses, rolling 2D landscapes, and fun classic gameplay. Requires a Sonic Mania RSDK file.
apps.localizedDescription: Sonic Mania is an all-new adventure with Sonic, Tails, and Knuckles full of unique bosses, rolling 2D landscapes, and fun classic gameplay. Requires a Sonic Mania RSDK file.
apps.title: Sonic Mania
